sentences.en: But surely this puts a different complexion on things.
sentences.cn: 但是这肯定让局势有了变化。

sentences.en: Drinking water is good for the complexion.
Fatigue and stress quickly result in a dull complexion and a furrowed brow.
sentences.cn: 疲劳和压力会很快导致肤色暗淡无光、额头出现皱纹。

sentences.en: He had a naturally ruddy complexion.
His complexion was colorless and he hadn't shaved.
sentences.cn: 他面无血色，胡子也没刮。

sentences.en: His fresh complexion made him look younger than he was.
sentences.cn: 他的好气色令他看上去比实际年龄年轻。

sentences.en: Mitchell is well built, of medium height, with a dark complexion.
sentences.cn: 米切尔体格健壮，中等个头，肤色黝黑。

sentences.en: My complexion remained pale and pasty.
Rain water was once considered to be good for the complexion.
sentences.cn: 雨水曾一度被认为可以滋养皮肤。

sentences.en: Red does not suit with her complexion.
sentences.cn: 红色与她的肤色不协调.

sentences.en: She attributed her flawless complexion to the moisturiser she used.
sentences.cn: 她将自己无瑕的肌肤归功于所使用的保湿霜。

sentences.en: She has a poor complexion and pock marks on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她满面菜色，额头上有些麻子。

sentences.en: She was rather fat, and her complexion was muddy and spotty.
sentences.cn: 她比较胖，脸色暗淡、多斑。

sentences.en: This mask leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 这种面膜能使你的皮肤变得柔软细嫩。

sentences.en: Years of heavy drinking had given Alison a florid complexion.
sentences.cn: 长期酗酒使艾莉森面色绯红.

trans.tran_en: the natural colour or appearance of the skin on your face
